snippet: Bank stocks were also getting beaten down as investors worried that they could suffer if loans to oil and gas companies went bad.
abstract: Steep decrease in price of oil drags on global stark market, as investors remain worried about Chinese and United States manufacturing data.
lead_paragraph: Bank stocks were also getting beaten down as investors worried that they could suffer if loans to oil and gas companies went bad.

headline.main: Market Tumbles Along With Oil Prices
headline.print_headline: As the Price of Oil Falls, So Fall the Markets
